spell1.name: ADJUDICATION
spell1.description: Fire at enemies with Adjudication, his Automatic Rifle.

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 70% at 40m

spell2.name: DELIVERANCE
spell2.description: Fire at enemies with Deliverance, his Shotgun.

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 8m, decreasing to 40% at 15m

spell3.name: FINAL JUDGEMENT
spell3.description: Unleash two Gatling guns and missiles to attack enemies.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Rapid-fire projectiles that hit instantly and have a tracking trajectory

spell4.name: VANTAGE CONNECTION
spell4.description: Launch a hook to generate a cable that enables the Punisher to move rapidly by pressing F.

spell5.name: CULLING TURRET
spell5.description: Deploy a Culling Turret that grounds Punisher and blocks damage from the front while dealing massive damage.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Rapid-fire projectiles that create a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: CROSSHAIR SPREAD RADIUS (AT 10M)
attributes.value: Start with a spread radius of 0.2m, which reduces to 0.1m after 10 shots, and further decreases to 0.05m after 20 shots

spell6.name: SCOURGE GRENADE
spell6.description: Throw a smoke grenade forward to obscure enemy vision and leap backward.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Create a temporary smokescreen that obstructs vision

spell7.name: WARRIOR'S GAZE
spell7.description: Retain vision of enemies that disappear from view for a short duration.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Retain vision of enemies that disappear from view for a short duration.
